mapper.delete: delete from department where department_id in #{id}
mapper.update: update department set department_name = #{depart.departmentName}, note = #{depart.note} where department_id = #{depart.departmentId}
mapper.select: select department_id as departmentId,department_name as departmentName,note from department where department_id = #{id}
